translations: adj.（用于加强语气，具有冒犯性）该死的
adv.（用于加强语气，具有冒犯性）该死地

phrs.translation: 冰雹游戏, 该死的冰雹, 冰雹危机
该死的陨石, 毁灭地球
蠕虫吞噬火柴人变态版
了不起的维克多‧尼基弗洛夫先生

sentences.sentence: There was a lot of effing and blinding going on.
She told him it was none of his effing business.
sentences.translation: 她跟他讲那根本就不关他的事。

sentences.sentence: Remember in Windows XP when you hooked up an external hard drive and it was unrecognized, requiring you to search the web to find that stupid effing software driver?
sentences.translation: 是否还记得Windows XP经常遇到外置硬盘无法识别，或者到处搜索寻找愚蠢的软件驱动的情况？
